backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing site ownership, user profiles, orders, and admin‑restricted actions with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report indicating a checkout update to use a new Bitcoin address and listing related frontend files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public pages and admin‑protected sections using the layout and guard components.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard enforcing authentication and site‑owner checks with login prompts, claim flow, and protected rendering.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Bitcoin: UI component displaying order‑specific Bitcoin payment details with copy‑to‑clipboard helpers and warnings.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top-level layout with header, navigation, admin link handling, recent orders menu, and footer wrapper.
frontend/src/components/orders/RecentOrd: Dropdown listing up to five recent orders with live status lookup and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Denom: Grid of denomination cards showing discounted USDT and BTC amounts using the current BTC/USDT rate.
Callout card displaying the minimum and maximum supported USDT denominations.
Select input for choosing a denomination from predefined USDT values with range info.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Quant: Quantity input with increment/decrement controls enforcing min/max bounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBtcUsdtRate.ts: Fetches BTC/USDT rate with caching, fallback logic, and periodic refresh via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication with AuthClient, including login state and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistory.ts: Loads and syncs persisted order history from storage and exposes loading state and order list.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderHistoryDetail: Fetches detailed order data for multiple order IDs using react-query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for fetching, creating, and updating orders and contact messages via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables, including custom Binance color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, react-query, and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing the service, features, and platform benefits using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminContactMes: Shows a table of customer contact messages with loading/error states for admin review.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Displays detailed order info for admins and allows updating the order status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Lists all orders for admin management with status badges and navigation to details or messages.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Gift card catalog page allowing denomination and quantity selection, saving cart data, and navigating to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including buyer info, order creation, BTC amount calculation, and cart clearing, storing an order snapshot after successful submission. Shows validation, error handling, and payment instructions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form that submits user messages via a mutation and displays success or error alerts. Manages simple form validation and resets fields upon success.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Renders a FAQ page with accordion-based questions covering gift cards, payment, delivery, discounts, and order tracking. Contains static informational content only.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section, product intro, navigation buttons, denomination callout, and feature highlights. Focuses on marketing content and links to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a user’s stored order history with live status lookups and badge indicators. Handles loading, empty state, error display, and links to catalog if no orders exist.
frontend/src/pages/OrderStatusPage.tsx: Displays detailed order status, payment info, and BTC-to-USDT estimates with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/TrackOrderPage.tsx: Provides a form to enter an order ID and navigate to the order status page with basic validation.
frontend/src/state/cartSession.ts: Manages saving, loading, and clearing cart data in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/state/orderHistory.ts: Maintains a localStorage-backed history of recent orders with add, update, remove, and clear operations.
frontend/src/utils/denominations.ts: Exports the list of supported gift card denominations.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Provides utilities to normalize unknown errors and map backend error messages to friendly user-facing text.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Converts backend order statuses into simplified labels and badge variants for UI display.
frontend/src/utils/pricing.ts: Implements pricing logic including discount calculation, USDT/BTC conversions, and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom themes, fonts, colors, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to updating the displayed BTC payment address.
